electricityContract.terms: Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs. We will issue your bill at least quarterly, or if you have a Smart Meter, monthly, unless you have requested to be billed quarterly or your Smart Meter does not have active telecommunications.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: Between 12pm and 2pm Saturday and Sunday, your electricity usage charges will be waived for any electricity consumed at your Supply Address. Service to property charges apply.
For every unit of electricity you buy from Red Energy, Snowy Hydro Limited will match it by generating one unit of electricity from a renewable source.

eligibility.information: Offer only available to residential customers currently within the Citipower distribution zone with applicable network tariff and sign up online via www.redenergy.com.au. Customers must have a smart meter or interval meter and be the registered owner of an electric vehicle, which has the same address as the customer's electricity supply address.

singleRate.description: Generally apply for 7 hours a day and the times are managed by your network (Hot water and/or slab heating only).

greenPowerCharges.description: Red Energy offers 100% GreenPower for an extra 3.3 cents per kWh. Please contact us on 131 806 for more information.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
